WITH ALLBUYER AS( SELECT BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_LGU, BUYER_BANK, BUYER_BANKNO, BUYER_BANKNAME, BUYER_ZIP, BUYER_ADD1, BUYER_ADD2, BUYER_COMTEL, BUYER_FAX, BUYER_MAIL, BUYER_CHARGER, BUYER_TELEXT, LPROD_NM "lprod.lprodNm"
ORDER BY BUYER_NAME ) SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALLBUYER.* FROM ALLBUYER )A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
